description: Dark haired, 19 year-old cutie Lucky Adams is home alone one cold, winter night. Curling up by the fire, he starts to feel really comfy, and horny! After slowly massaging his burgeoning hardon through his clothes, the boy slowly undresses and proceeds to work himself into a state of hard excitement. The warmth of the fire and his natural teenage sexdrive combine to produce a nice, pleasurable load of boycream.
title: CitiBoyz 10: Getting Lucky
